title: The DASH Diet Chicken Cookbook: 30 Delicious Low Salt Chicken Recipes for Lowering Blood Pressure, Losing Weight and Improving Your Health
description: Topping the charts as one of the safest and most effective diets available to health conscience individuals, the DASH (Dietary Approach to Stop Hypertension) diet extends its proven track record of success. In a nutshell, the DASH diet is a plant-focused diet, rich in fruits, vegetables, nuts and low-fat dairy products. It also embraces lean cuts of meat, fish, seafood,and poultry, as well as whole grains. Today, our bodies are bombarded with high-calorie, processed foods, many of them reliant on grains, legumes and high-fat dairy products. These are all more difficult for the human body to digest and absorb, but more importantly, they are linked to heart disease, high blood pressure, diabetes, and strokes. Eating for Life Enter the fastest growing diet approach to combating hypertension…The DASH Diet. Proven to reduce blood pressure and the risk of diabetes, this diet is a healthy alternative to other less medical diet options. Learn to base your food consumption on the natural elements your body was initially designed to more protein (meat, seafood, and other lean animal products), fewer carbohydrates, and greater fiber. Maintaining a healthy lifestyle, which includes DASH friendly foods, is not easy but doable…and now, it can also be soooo delicious. Something for Everyone The DASH Diet Chicken Cookbook includes 30 glorious (low salt) recipes to tempt your palate. Each recipe caters to all skill levels and tastes, using the most versatile meat know to man – chicken. Eat well and reduce your blood pressure in the process.The recipes are straightforward and mouth-watering delicious. If you can create meaningful goals, follow simple directions, and set aside a few minutes a day, you can achieve great success by adhering to the DASH diet. However, we’ve just made it easier by providing this valuable resource, which is destined to be well used in your kitchen on a daily basis. Learn what thousands have already your body is a food-processing machine; give it what it wants and what’s best for it – but don’t give up the taste! A Wealth of Dietary Information It's your body; you’ll need it for a lifetime. Start reducing your blood pressure and risk of disease by eating healthier – you’ll feel, and be, stronger in days. Adopt a healthy attitude and buy this cookbook today! You'll have absolutely no regrets, but will be thrilled with the results you achieve.
